titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Finding aid prepared by Anne Harney

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-09-13T21:23-0400

did.abstract: Correspondence compiled by Edward E. Wildman and Francis D. West, chiefly from original letters in the Historical Society of Pennsylvania and other depositories, 1956.
did.physdesc: 719 items, typed. Typewritten transcript. This collection is also available on microfilm (Film 1433).

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical note
bioghist.p: John Bartram was the first native American botanist and made many journeys through the southern frontier, collecting seeds and bulbs for transplanting.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: Originals of parts of this collection are in the Historical Society of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia.

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies note
altformavail.p: This collection is also available on microfilm (Film 1433).

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Presented by Edward E. Wildman, 1956, second copy presented by W.W. Cadbury, 1956; both accessioned the same year. Deaccessioned second copy (1956 1166ms), 1982. Gift to John Bartram Association, Philadelphia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Among the material covered is Bartram's journey to Fort Oswego in 1743 for a treaty with the Five Nations; other references principally to Indian hostilities in South.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Parts of this collection are published in William Darlington, Memorials of John Bartram and Humphrey Marshall, (Philadelphia, 1849).

processinfo.head: Processing Information note
processinfo.p: This unpublished manuscript contains a subject and name index and an introduction by Edward E. Wildman.

odd.head: Early American History Note
odd.p: The John Bartram Collection consists of typed transcriptions of originals held at the Historical Society of Pennsylvania. The transcripts take up two volumes and are extensive.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Charter Member of the American Philosophical Society, ed. by Edward E. Wildman; T.D. 719 leaves, 35p. of photostats Done in part by F.D. West. Deposited by the editor, grantee, Jan.1956.
